title: ROGERTHAT777
author: ROGERTHAT777
content: I have traded many coins in the past. I have an iphone with metmask and when I go to buy coins on metamask it send me to the new release downoad the metamsk app instead of just added the bnb coins to my pancakeswap so I can buy them.  If I click on the open it will put up the wallet display with trust and wallet connect and metamask and whether I used the wallet connect or metmask symbol it still won't load my bnb coins so I can buy the new altcoins.  I turned the wifi back on and off and turned the phone on an off.  I have too many coins to download the app all over again and custom add them back on does anyone know what this is?

comments.author: ROGERTHAT777
comments.body: redirection with url that is not HTTPS comes up? this is very frustrating.  I can't load all the coins againby reloading the app? what's going on?

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: Have you tried with other devices besides Iphone or can you use another computer to connect to the market? I don't use an Iphone but it seems the app with the new update you downloaded is not working properly. But for this problem You need to contact official Zendesk tickets.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Actually I dont find any issue on that. If its not working on apple using the metamask app then probably the problem is on thr system of apple. Cant find this problem on an android phone. Hence, I thin Im gonna try to use desktop instead of the app, maybe there was something wrong in the apple format.

comments.author: ROGERTHAT777
comments.body: I contacted metmask support and I'm waiting on a reply to those who are new I have done this last year and the best thng to do is not panic or reload the app because if you have lots of little coins you have to manually reload them all over again.  I am going to just wait this out and hope they resolve it.  get you those little baby coins homey

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Quote from: ROGERTHAT777 on May 07, 2022, 10:36:22 PMI have traded many coins in the past. I have an iphone with metmask and when I go to buy coins on metamask it send me to the new release downoad the metamsk app instead of just added the bnb coins to my pancakeswap so I can buy them.  If I click on the open it will put up the wallet display with trust and wallet connect and metamask and whether I used the wallet connect or metmask symbol it still won't load my bnb coins so I can buy the new altcoins.  I turned the wifi back on and off and turned the phone on an off.  I have too many coins to download the app all over again and custom add them back on does anyone know what this is? I think you know that metamask on Apple is not safe to use. Metamask saves a backup to iCloud.Read how to turn it off.The new mediamask is very easy to set uphttps://chainlist.org/You connect to this site and add the necessary networks.Next, you copy the addresses of smart contracts on Coingeco and add the necessary tokens to your wallet.If you have a large amount of tokens, then I would buy a small lightweight 13-inch ultrabook and a Ledger or Trezor hardware wallet.

comments.author: malcovi2
comments.body: pancake swap started restricting some countries from using their services, Its starting to shift into a cex exchange.

comments.author: Bttzed03
comments.body: Looking at your post history, it appears you really have issues using Dapps with your iphone. You should probably find a different device for your crypto transactions to avoid future inconveniences. If you insist on using it for security, have it your way.Anyway, update us on the feedback by Metamask support.

comments.author: ROGERTHAT777
comments.body: I have the wallet option turned off on my icloud on my iphone but there is no specific "metamask" icon on the backup apps section.  Does this suffice? my icloud is full and right now I am not adding to it. thank you.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: Have you tried switching networks?  Some Pancakeswap connection problem is solved by switching network several times before connecting with the Bep20 network.  If it still fail maybe you can use the built-in swap function of Metamask to sell your coins until you find the fix to your issue.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: ROGERTHAT777 on May 08, 2022, 05:26:55 PMredirection with url that is not HTTPS comes up? this is very frustrating.  I can't load all the coins againby reloading the app? what's going on? I think the best thing to do is precisely describe the challenges you are facing and include screenshots plus error messages that you are seeing.I hope you are aware that some of these so-called Dexes have started restricting people from other regions. Make sure you are from a region that is not restricted.

comments.author: rahmad2nd
comments.created_time: May 08, 2022, 11:37:02 PMLast edit: May 09, 2022, 09:01:15 AM by rahmad2nd
comments.body: Have sevveral countries not allowed connected metamask with BNB chain by problem IP address, my country need VPN for access to metamask using BNB chain, but with different network success access without use VPN. Maybe your country not allowed with Local IP and need use VPN.I think will working when you access Metamask wallet trough VPN because usually I use add on chrome metamask and need VPN IP when make transaction with BNB network chain. Maybe you need try with my step recommended and check keep worth or not.

comments.author: ROGERTHAT777
comments.body: I tried switching the network once, I believe several times is worth a try. Will let you know.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Buying BNB directly from Metamask has nothing to do with Pancakeswap. You have to get it first on your Metamask wallet. Since you said it drives you to download a new release page, have you verified you are running the latest version of the wallet?Also buying BNB on Metamask is getting thorough from Transak or Moonpay, have you also verified that those platforms are supported by your country?

comments.author: ROGERTHAT777
comments.body: I already have the bnb on my account it won't load the pancake swap when I go to buy the coins, it is not getting to the point where I can see the bnb that is in my wallet on the pancake swap exchange to buy the coins

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: I'm not an IOS user, but some wallets with IOS have had problems lately, it seems they also announced that there was indeed a bug for their IOS application. As far as I'm using the extension from chrome, and the android app I didn't find any problem everything went very smoothly. Maybe you can try it, using another system like chrome or android extension for a while.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Quote from: ROGERTHAT777 on May 09, 2022, 03:26:11 AMI already have the bnb on my account it won't load the pancake swap when I go to buy the coins, it is not getting to the point where I can see the bnb that is in my wallet on the pancake swap exchange to buy the coins Can you show some screenshots regarding why it won't load?Did you use the Metamask browser feature? And have you checked if the connected wallet on Pancakeswap is tied to the address that has the BNB?

comments.author: leea-1334
comments.body: Sorry if I am confusing by adding to the problem but can you do 2 things here?1> Look up your address on public explorer like bscan just to confirm that your wallet is safe and your BNB is in there (this is just a lookup not going into your wallet.2> Do you have your seed? If so, you should be fine. Try using Browser MetaMask extension and recover from there until you fix your app/iCloud.

comments.author: lablab03
comments.body: Quote from: ROGERTHAT777 on May 07, 2022, 10:36:22 PMI have traded many coins in the past. I have an iphone with metmask and when I go to buy coins on metamask it send me to the new release downoad the metamsk app instead of just added the bnb coins to my pancakeswap so I can buy them.  If I click on the open it will put up the wallet display with trust and wallet connect and metamask and whether I used the wallet connect or metmask symbol it still won't load my bnb coins so I can buy the new altcoins.  I turned the wifi back on and off and turned the phone on an off.  I have too many coins to download the app all over again and custom add them back on does anyone know what this is?  it's obviously not updated bro, and probably you keep installing the same version.. If i were you if you can install another browser on you iPhone that has extension such yandex or whatever it is, i suggest must try it and for sure it work correctly. Dont used the app coz maybe it's not compatible anymore in your device. If you have Desktop or laptop it will be a good idea as well.
